description.value: When Activating recite terrifying litanies for the next two minutes all Humans in 50 Metres make WP Test or take -10 penalty to next skill test. Cannot Communicate or talk with others while active. Affects even those who can't hear, although they will not know it is you who is speaking.

specialAbilities.name: Inspire Awe
specialAbilities.description: Once per encounter, you may inspire awe in all who witness you. All enemies within 20m must make a Willpower Test or be Stunned for 1 round.
